author: Pmeiring
body:
#### PR description:

This draft PR introduces the calibrations of the CALO-L2 objects for the first L1 menu of 2025.
==> To be updated with Tau/Jet calibrations

The caloParams file includes the conservative ZS scheme from:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/1524376/#31-technical-instructions-for

This PR depends on:
https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter/pull/25 

#### PR validation:

To be validated

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: CALO-L2 EG, Tau, Jet calibrations with conservative ZS for first L1 menu 2025
